game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple
game.description: The temple has been hidden for centuries, but rumors of its treasures have drawn many adventurers. You must navigate its deadly traps and puzzles to claim the artifact.
game.reward: 100 gold pieces and a magical amulet

tasks.objective: Find the hidden entrance to the temple
tasks.description: Look for a secret door in the nearby village's ancient ruins
Use your knowledge of the ancient civilization to figure out which tiles to step on
Use your combat skills to take down the powerful guardian
